levels.effect:

The Drone locks onto an enemy until the enemy is defeated, the Drone self-destructs or until the skill is over, then returns to the Operator

elite_levels.description: When this unit's skill is active, Drones have a 10% chance to self-destruct when attacking (and then return to the Operator), dealing 200% of Goldenglow's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in a small area

When this unit's skill is active, Drones have a 10% chance to self-destruct when attacking (and then return to the Operator), dealing 300% of Goldenglow's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in a small area

potential_upgrades.description: When this unit's skill is active, Drones have a 10% chance to self-destruct when attacking (and then return to the Operator), dealing 215% (+15%) of Goldenglow's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in a small area

When this unit's skill is active, Drones have a 10% chance to self-destruct when attacking (and then return to the Operator), dealing 315% (+15%) of Goldenglow's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in a small area

elite_levels.description: Goldenglow and her Drones' attacks ignore 15 RES

potential_upgrades.description: Goldenglow and her Drones' attacks ignore 18 (+3) RES
